```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
path_out= "C:/Users/vanessa.van.deusen/Desktop/Van.Deusen_Local/CPFV_local/Data/Predictor_Datasets"
```

## Importing data
```{r cars}
PDO_txt<- read_table("C:/Users/vanessa.van.deusen/Desktop/Van.Deusen_Local/CPFV_local/Data/Predictor_Datasets/Raw/ersst.v5.pdo.dat.txt", skip=1)
```

##Changing from Horizontal to Long format
```{r}
pdo_long <- PDO_txt %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -Year, 
    names_to = "Month_Name", 
    values_to = "PDO"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    # Convert month names (Jan, Feb) into numbers (1, 2) to match your Gas/CPI data
    Month = match(Month_Name, month.abb),
    Year = as.numeric(Year)
  ) %>%
  select(Year, Month, PDO)
```

##Exporting
```{r}
write.csv(pdo_long,file.path(path_out, "PDO.csv"))
```
